name: quorum
description: The Quorum service lets you create, delete, monitor and maintain individual Quorum nodes and connect them to a blockchain network.

servicePlans.name: cyon
servicePlans.description: Connect Your Own Network (CYON) into SAP BTP.

servicePlans.name: dev
servicePlans.description: Environment with all relevant APIs for developing and testing of Solidity Smart Contracts on a fixed network with shared nodes.

servicePlans.name: testnet
servicePlans.description: Quorum node which is part of a cross organizational test network available for developing and testing distributed applications. It may not be used productively.
